description:
Valentine`s Day has come. The girls throughout Edo are buying up chocolate. Odd Jobs guys say that they`re not interested in Valentine`s Day, but Gintoki and Shinpachi are both dressed up fashionably for the occasion. Suddenly, a giant chocolate falls from the sky. The chocolate is from Space Woman, a superhero who fights for Justice in space. Everyone thinks that it is odd for a superhero to partake in Valentine`s Day. It seems that Space Woman has a something weighing on her mind…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Heroes Have Their Own Problems
ヒーローだって悩んでる
